column1: # Title: Smooth resource curve parameters for carbon storage by province
# Units: price unit: 2010 $/tCO2; Capacity unit: MtCO2

# Description: Note: base price depends on value added potential. Zero if there is potential. 10% of mid price if Low # potential. 30% of mid price if No potential; Note: Hainan and Tibet mid price of 100 arbitrarily set to be similar to other provinces with zero storage
# Source: Bob Dahowski and Casie Davidson - PNNL
